channel.title: software-security on kel.bz
channel.description: Recent content in software-security on kel.bz

item.title: Questions for System Design Reviews
item.description: Moving towards operationalizing system design reviews. What questions should a review team ask, or expect to be answered?

item.title: What is the Value-add of ssh-agent?
item.description: The purpose of ssh-agent and observations how ssh-agent improves UX and security.

item.title: User-influenced Shell Commands Are Still Considered Harmful
item.description: Non-obvious ways of getting code execution when testing code that uses user input to build shell commands.

item.title: Fuzzing Servers
item.description: One tip for finding fast and useful fuzz targets for networked code.
